text: in my government career aws was starting
to come into that environment i reached
out to a friend that i knew that had
recently gone from the government space
into aws like hey how can i get in on
this so aws intelligence was a program
that i started about six years ago i
mean it was kind of a training program
but it was also to help kind of take
folks that were not familiar with
government space and bring them into
something that we were building for our
government customers before i came to
aws i was a college student i always
wanted to work for amazon right like i'm
a tech person of course you want to work
for amazon but i never in a million
years believed that i could aws
intelligence initiative offered me an
opportunity to grow in my career i
joined straight out of university it was
my first full-time job came directly
into aws intelligence was with the team
for about eight months and then joined
ec2 so with aws intelligence what
they're doing they're trying to link
like-minded experiences and backgrounds
with the customer
day one here they hand you a laptop they
give you a lot of background they give
you nothing but airspace and altitude
the first couple of months is training
and onboarding and getting my feet wet
and then you start rotation i was at an
impasse and i didn't know what to do
next and then my manager introduced the
aws intelligence team for me they
actually take technicians like myself
from the data centers or outside of
amazon and train them to make them
service ready for service teams inside
aws it started with just 20 people and
now we have hundreds of people in the
program we can allow the government to
move so fast faster than they've ever
moved before four years ago i never
imagined that i'll find myself as an s3
engineer in aws and this is all thanks
to aws intelligence the role you came in
with isn't necessarily the role you're
going to go out with really the world is
your oyster here and really your
creativity is is as far as you can take
it i get to work on the coolest
technology i get to work with the
coolest people and i get to work for the
coolest company so yes i love it
[Music]
